title: Qube Social Network
description: Social media feed with sorting algorithm
longDescription: Real-time data streaming with LSTM-based forecasting, custom WebGL visualizations, and integrated 2FA for secure access.

title: EcoSphere Mobile
longDescription: Mobile app for monitoring household energy and air quality with Firebase sync, push alerts, and D3.js visualizations.

title: CryptoVault Pro
description: Secure portfolio tracker for digital assets.
longDescription: Multi-chain wallet insights with live pricing, staking analytics, and granular alerts using Next.js and Solidity integrations.

title: Lumina Workspace
longDescription: AI Nexus is a state-of-the-art predictive analytics platform. It leverages deep learning models to process millions of data points across global markets in real-time. By implementing advanced LSTM networks, the dashboard provides users with actionable insights and potential market shifts before they happen, effectively democratizing institutional-grade financial tools for independent traders.
